name: Be Boost
author: Noor alam

sections.description:
Be Boost is a helper plugin for BeShop theme.

It will show social buttons that your users can click to share to Facebook, Twitter, Google-plus,Buffer and Pinterest your site product.Be Boost is very lightweight WordPress plugin. so you can easily add share buttons in you single product page automatically.

Awesome Plugin’s Features

  • + Sharing with Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Pinterest, Tumblr.
  • + Integrated WordPress social sharing for all your single product.
  • Full support for Retina and high resolution displays.
  • + Nice hover animation.
  • + Super lightweight social sharing plugin
  • + User-friendly
  • + Responsive
  • + Touch friendly

Translations

  • English
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Be Boost plugin!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  1. Unzip the Be-Boost.zip file locally to your machine
  2. Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  3. Upload the Be Boost folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  4. Go to plugin and activate Be Boost.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  1. Login to your WordPress admin area.
  2. Navigate to plugin and click the Add New button at the top
  3. Click the Upload plugin button at the top
  4. Click the Choose File button and locate the Be-Boost.zip
  5. File on your machine and click the Install Now button
  6. On the basis the plugin installs correctly, click the Activate link.
sections.faq:
Can I share my shop product by Be Boost

yes, you can share your shop product.

How many social share site support in this plugin

This plugin version support 5 share site.
